Mike were you watching EJ_SA's twitch stream yesterday? He could have used this when his shuttle came down short of the runway, and fortunately for some "very good wheel bearings" managed to roll all the way to the hanger for his standard disembarkment shot.

PS: lol, auto-correct keeps wanting to change disembarkment to dismemberment.

ok, forgot to post that in the OP
Focus mainly on aero, i want to get it right. Also test the airlock dockport.
already in the first test run in Columbia (of all shuttles)

Cool. Check gimball speed it more suitable. Doesnt flick fast like it did

- - - Updated - - -

Also its takeoff speed... is it too fast? Forgot also to time the booster burn time
it DID seem to heat up around max Q, but that could have been user error on my part...

If you want to hold off on the download a bit longer I can add the lighting to shuttle.

Saw some youtube videos (so cool) and looks like they could use some
ok, will do, so far, tests are overwhelmingly to my satisfaction. going to have to finish the tests tomorrow after work, though. need to go to bed.
Good to hear things working!
Tomorrow, i will turn my recorder on to tape the approach and landing tests and columbia's reentry.

i Noticed a couple of things with the 747

1. the nose gear turns while speeding up (same for STS and CSS(not sure for dreamchaser))

2. the rudder does not work it does not wants to turn to right or left (it does turn when i press q or e(bank left bank right))

3. the place where the centre gears are does not fully close or it wont completely cover the place where the gear is

Besides that i love it!

Hell yeah!
